products.name: Dope 2X-Up Knitted Facemask Black
products.description: The 2X-UP Knitted facemask from Dope is an essential piece of mountain gear. It’s cosy, comfy, and super warm, meaning you can shred all day long in all weathers. This facemask has been built using an highly elasticated construction that retains its shape over time, meaning that it doesn’t feel tight and contours to the shape of your face and it won’t stretch out. On top of that, the material is breathable, helping prevent sweat and moisture build-up and keep you warm, dry, and breathing easy for longer, even in the toughest conditions.

products.name: Dope Ace Ski Gloves Black
products.description: The next generation of Dope Snow Gloves, engineered with rider feedback at the core, blends proven durability with enhanced functionality and fit. Retaining the trusted, ultra-durable TPU palm for unmatched grip and abrasion resistance, the glove now features a newly developed cut-resistant ripstop fabric between the fingers. The elastic cuff has been redesigned for improved access and ease of use, now featuring an adjustable strap to ensure a secure and customizable fit. Inside, a removable liner glove offers multiple benefits: reduced bulk and creasing, a more precise fit, and easier drying and maintenance. This modular design enhances performance in varying conditions and extends the life of the glove. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Removable Liner: Adds versatility and warmth, reduces bulk, and makes drying easy. Safety Strap: Secures around your wrist so you never drop a glove or mitten on the mountain. Wrist Adjuster: A durable buckle strap for a snug, secure fit at the wrist. Pull-On Strap: Reinforced loop makes it easy to pull on your gloves. Hi-Grip Palm: Strategically placed grip zones offer better control and durability in key areas.

products.name: Dope Ace 24 Ski Gloves Black
products.description: The improved Ace gloves are designed for all-day comfort, balancing the use of water resistant and breathable materials for longterm performance. With a TPU palm and a 15k/15k water resistant and breathable back, the areas exposed to the elements the most are given the most protection. For added breathability and to eliminate sweat buildup, a lightweight nylon riptstop has been added between the fingers, along with a low-profile, slim-fitting cuff for superior jacket-to-glove fit. Inside, a microfleece liner balances warmth with breathability, ensuring stable and reliable heat management no matter the conditions. Built to endure cold winters, slushy springs, and everything in between, the Ace is the cornerstone of our glove lineup and the perfect glove for all adventures.

products.name: Dope Ace 22 Ski Gloves Black
products.description: The Ace gloves are built for winter and ready for anything. We made them with Dope Performance 15K fabric, which has an awesome 15k/15k waterproofing and breathability rating! Then, we went one step further and gave them a neoprene cuff for warmth and durability, a cosy fleece lining and a super strong polyurethane palm for both abrasion and water resistance. And for breathability, we skipped the plastic membrane to make sure your hands never get sweaty again! All in all, these gloves are perfect for long days on the mountain. And they’re made even better with a non-slip palm print, ideal for slippery button lifts. We think that all sounds pretty great. Don’t you?

Inside, a microfleece liner balances warmth with breathability, ensuring stable and reliable heat management no matter the conditions. Built to endure cold winters, slushy springs, and everything in between, the Ace is the cornerstone of our glove lineup and the perfect mitten for all adventures.

products.name: Dope Ace Snow Mittens Soft Pink
products.description: The next generation of Dope Snow Mittens, engineered with rider feedback at the core, blends proven durability with enhanced functionality and fit. Retaining the trusted, ultra-durable TPU palm for unmatched grip and abrasion resistance, the glove now features a newly developed cut-resistant ripstop fabric between the fingers. The elastic cuff has been redesigned for improved access and ease of use, now featuring an adjustable strap to ensure a secure and customizable fit. Inside, a removable liner mitt offers multiple benefits: reduced bulk and creasing, a more precise fit, and easier drying and maintenance. This modular design enhances performance in varying conditions and extends the life of the mitten. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. products.name: Dope Adept Ski Jacket Men Black
products.description: Simplicity redefined. The Adept is a reliable zip-through jacket with all the features you need for a long day on the slopes. Highly waterproof, durable, and designed with the whole mountain in mind, the Adept is a staple in the Dope Snow lineup, and for good reason too. So say goodbye to swapping coats on the fly and choose the last one you'll ever want to own. When it comes to checking all the boxes, this is it. One jacket that really can do it all. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Solution Dyed: Solution Dyed fabrics promote sustainability by conserving water and energy in their production. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Storm Guard Hood: Helmet-compatible storm guard hood with front and rear drawstring adjustment for the perfect fit. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Elasticated Snow Skirt: Non-slip elasticated snow skirt with adjustable button closure to keep you dry in the deepest powder. Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Wrist Gaiters: Stretchy and comfortable, perfect for keeping the snow out. Front Zipper with Double Plackets: Double placket system ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Microfleece Chinguard: Super soft microfleece lined chinguard Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 60/40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope Snuggle Base Layer Pant Men 2X-Up Burgundy
products.description: The new generation Snuggle base layers are the perfect companion for all your winter adventures. Made with a super stretchy and highly breathable spandex-polyester blend with Anti-Odour HeiQ tech and our quickest drying and most moisture wicking construction yet, the Snuggle is ready for even the most active days on the mountain. Now equipped with an improved peached backer for unbeatable comfort, along with reinforced flatlock seams to eliminate chafing and provide unmatched durability, the Snuggle base layers are a result of years of refinement. The result is the most comfortable and functional base layers available: ride every day, all season in total comfort. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. products.name: Dope Macon 2.0 Ski Helmet Classic Matte Black w/ Black
products.description: The Macon 2.0 is a skate-styled ski and snowboard helmet packed with tech to keep your head safe this winter. With a hard-shell construction, the Macon 2.0 is 20% lighter than the original Macon, and has a low-profile, bombshell look ensuring optimum fit with goggles as well as hoods. Now featuring Bern’s Compass Fit system, you can dial in the snugness to your exact size for superior safety and comfort all day long. With a removable liner and included summer line option, the Macon is ideal for use all year round, both on and off the mountain, and with a host of safety standards, you can trust that you’ll be well looked after in the event of a crash. Safety Standards: CPSC, EN1077B, EN1078 MIPS: No All of our Dope x Bern collaboration helmets include both a winter and a summer liner for all season use. Clip-on strap: Quick clip-on and easy release. Adjustable size/fitting: Simple and customizable sizing for a perfect fit on your head. Goggle strap retainer: Secures your goggles to your helmet for convenient and hassle-free usage.

products.name: Dope Macon 2.0 MIPS Ski Helmet X-Up Matte Black w/ Black
products.description: The Macon 2.0 is a skate-styled ski and snowboard helmet packed with tech to keep your head safe this winter. With a hard-shell construction, the Macon 2.0 is 20% lighter than the original Macon, and has a low-profile, bombshell look ensuring optimum fit with goggles as well as hoods. Now featuring Bern’s Compass Fit system, you can dial in the snugness to your exact size for superior safety and comfort all day long. With a removable liner and included summer line option, the Macon is ideal for use all year round, both on and off the mountain, and with a host of safety standards, you can trust that you’ll be well looked after in the event of a crash. This version of the helmet also features MIPS technology. Standing for Multi-Directional Impact Protection System, MIPS is an extra layer of protection while riding that disperses energy during glancing or off-angle impacts with the helmet. Designed to specifically reduce rotational force on the brain, MIPS is the best choice for protection while on the mountain, and is trusted by millions of riders every time they head onto the mountain. Safety Standards: CPSC, EN1077B, EN1078 MIPS: YES All of our Dope x Bern collaboration helmets include both a winter and a summer liner for all season use. MIPS: MIPS enhances the protection against concussion and trauma. Clip-on strap: Quick clip-on and easy release. Adjustable size/fitting: Simple and customizable sizing for a perfect fit on your head. Goggle strap retainer: Secures your goggles to your helmet for convenient and hassle-free usage.

products.name: Dope Watts Classic Ski Helmet X-Up Matte Black

products.name: Dope Big Ski Pants Men Black
products.description: Allow us to introduce the Dope B.I.G. Pants, a fresh addition to our All Mountain lineup. These pants are designed for maximum mobility with a clean, effortless style, and the fewest seams possible for enhanced durability and weatherproofing. We also threw in a dropped crotch and a baggy, wide-leg fit for ultimate comfort and a laid-back look. And with two zipped side pockets, a built-in stretchy belt with an aluminium buckle, and a zipped fly, these pants are perfect for all-mountain adventures, offering park-rat fashion with big mountain capability. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric, All Insulation and All Lining Elasticated Belt and Waistband: Get the perfect fit with a super comfortable and fully removable elasticated belt. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Adjustable Drawstring Hem: Customise your fit with an integrated drawstring and toggle adjuster. Fly Closure: Zipped fly opening for comfort and easy wardrobe changes. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – TSGS.

products.name: Dope Blizzard Full Zip Ski Jacket Men Black
products.description: Sleek, stylish, and ready for anything, the Blizzard Full Zip is a rider-favourite that blends comfort and performance, without the bulk. This zip-through combines a bombproof 2-way stretch outer shell with the sort of technical specs you’d see on a big-ticket coat, and a minimalist ethos that ditches unnecessary features to keep you light on your feet this season. The Blizzard is a simplified all-mountain brawler that’ll stand up to pretty much anything mother nature serves up, and will no doubt be the jacket you reach for again and again this season thanks to its simple, comfy, capable, and rider-forward design. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 2-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. A minimalist approach keeps you light on your feet so you can truly push your riding. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric, All Insulation and All Lining Storm Guard Hood: Helmet-compatible storm guard hood with front and rear drawstring adjustment for the perfect fit. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Wrist Gaiters: Stretchy and comfortable, perfect for keeping the snow out. Front Zipper with Double Plackets: Double placket system ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 60/40 gsm – Fellex®.

The Blizzard is a simplified all-mountain brawler that’ll stand up to pretty much anything mother nature serves up, and will no doubt be the jacket you reach for again and again this season thanks to its simple, comfy, capable, and rider-forward design. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 4-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. A minimalist approach keeps you light on your feet so you can truly push your riding. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Solution Dyed: Solution Dyed fabrics promote sustainability by conserving water and energy in their production. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Storm Guard Hood: Helmet-compatible storm guard hood with front and rear drawstring adjustment for the perfect fit. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Wrist Gaiters: Stretchy and comfortable, perfect for keeping the snow out. Front Zipper with Double Plackets: Double placket system ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Microfleece Chinguard: Super soft microfleece lined chinguard Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style. Insulated - Medium-weight insulation for perfect balance between warmth and performance (60gsm body, 40gsm sleeves and hood). Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 60/40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope Blizzard W Full Zip 24 Ski Jacket Women Black

This zip-through combines a bombproof 4-way stretch outer shell with the sort of technical specs you’d see on a big-ticket coat, and a minimalist ethos that ditches unnecessary features to keep you light on your feet this season. The Blizzard is a simplified all-mountain brawler that’ll stand up to pretty much anything mother nature serves up, and will no doubt be the jacket you reach for again and again this season thanks to its simple, comfy, capable, and rider-forward design. products.name: Dope Chunky Beanie Black
products.description: Need a little extra chunky style in your life? The Chunky beanie is a true team favourite thanks to its oversized look and super cosy feel. Our Dope beanies have been lovingly designed to provide all day comfort and performance in even the coldest conditions. Super stretchy and perfect for ripping the hill, raging at après, or just kicking it in the off-season, the Chunky is your new go-to beanie.

products.name: Dope Comfy Fleece Sweater Men Black
products.description: Comfy by name, comfy by nature, the Comfy sweater features a 250gsm 100% recycled polyester fleece construction that's guaranteed to lock in warmth in all weathers. With a slick half-button and chimney collar construction, this fleece is ideal for layering up on the slopes, or for hanging out at home. This super soft material is cosy on the skin, and its elasticated cuffs ensure quality fit and heat management. Offset shoulder seams reduce friction while riding, and some slick Dope accents score extra style points wherever you go, making the Comfy your new favourite this season. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. products.name: Dope Con W Ski Pants Women Black
products.description: The Con pants perfectly blend form and function, and are a team and rider favourite for good reason. These pants are special because they not only have that slimmer, thigh-hugging fit you’ve been craving, but are also super comfortable and provide total freedom of movement thanks to our improved 2-way stretch shell material. So, you still get that slim-cut profile, but with no awkward pulling or tugging, which makes the Con the ultimate pair of figure-hugging riding pants perfect for the whole mountain. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Zipped and Meshed Vents: Meshed and zippered vents make cooling off super simple. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Zippered Gusseted Hems: Gusseted hems provide enhanced boot fit, tailored snow protection, and a customisable look. Elastic Adjustable Waistband: Elasticated velcro tabs for quick and secure adjustment. For the perfect fit! Belt Loops for Suspenders: Velcro belt loops are compatible with Dope suspenders. Reinforced Fly Closure: Dual snap button and velcro closure for secure and comfortable fit. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope Cozy Hood II Facemask Black
products.description: The Cozy Hood from Dope is a revolution in neck warmers. Made from our super soft 250gsm 100% recycled polyester fleece, this thing will keep you toasty all day long! It's a hood combined with a neck-tube that you can pull down when you need some air, and with a drawstring adjustable hood to get that fit just right, this neck warmer is a lot more versatile than it first appears. But what about my helmet, you ask? Well, you’ll be glad to know that we built these neck warmers to accommodate a helmet, too. So you can really style it up and throw your helmet on under it. Wear it pulled down around your neck when you’re cruising, and pull it up for the deep stuff, the Cozy Hood is an all-mountain neck warmer that looks good, and feels even better. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Fabric

products.name: Dope Cozy II Fleece Hoodie Men Black
products.description: Most people think that the hoodie has reached its evolutionary peak. That it can’t get any better. But they just haven’t met the Cozy II yet. Made with our awesome 100% recycled polyester fleece, it has a relaxed fit and a super-soft handfeel. With a brushed inner and outer, this hoodie is toasty warm and comfy as heck! And with a 250gsm fabric weight, it’s ideal for even the coldest evenings kicking around the resort. We threw in a gusseted collar and bottom drawstring to keep the windchill out, and zipped pockets on the belly pouch to keep your stuff safe as you slip and slide back home. products.name: Dope Cyclone Ski Jacket Men Black
products.description: Sitting around pining for the nineties? For boxy cut jackets and really bad pop music? Well, us too. We sprinkled some retro flavour into our lineup with the Cyclone and blended modern softshell performance with a touch of throwback style to create... uh... this! Glorious, isn't it? It's got tech specs that'll make most ski jackets look like they're still running dial-up, and some awesome all-mountain design touches that make riding the whole resort a neon dream. Our Riding Hoodies collection blends style and performance with the use of our advanced softshell material, bringing waterproofing and mountain features to hoods you can wear every day, both on and off the slopes. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. bluesign® approved materials on this product are: All Fabric Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Fabric Weather Guard Hood: Weather-proof hood with a front gusset and front drawstring adjustment for the perfect fit. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Hook and Loop Adjustable Cuffs: Adjustable sleeve cuffs provide the perfect fit with or without gloves. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech.

products.name: Dope Iconic Ski Pants Men Black
products.description: What is an Icon? Something that defines its sphere of influence. A true standout. A god among mortals. All of these things. More, even. And that's what we have created here. A defining pair of pants that rules the mountain with the kind of unattainable brilliance that all others aspire to. The Iconic are superbly waterproof, tailored to perfection with a relaxed and dropped-crotch fit, and so damn handsome that you can't quite look directly at them — kind of like the sun. And now, you too can share in their sheer, blinding magnificence, too, by owning your own pair. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Solution Dyed: Solution Dyed fabrics promote sustainability by conserving water and energy in their production. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Zipped and Meshed Vents: Meshed and zippered vents make cooling off super simple. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Zippered Gusseted Hems: Gusseted hems provide enhanced boot fit, tailored snow protection, and a customisable look. Elastic Adjustable Waistband: Elasticated velcro tabs for quick and secure adjustment. For the perfect fit! Belt Loops for Suspenders: Velcro belt loops are compatible with Dope suspenders. Reinforced Fly Closure: Dual snap button and velcro closure for secure and comfortable fit. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 40 gsm – Fellex®.

The Iconic are superbly waterproof, tailored to perfection with a relaxed and dropped-crotch fit, and so damn handsome that you can't quite look directly at them — kind of like the sun. And now, you too can share in their sheer, blinding magnificence, too, by owning your own pair. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Solution Dyed: Solution Dyed fabrics promote sustainability by conserving water and energy in their production. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Zipped and Meshed Vents: Meshed and zippered vents make cooling off super simple. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Zippered Gusseted Hems: Gusseted hems provide enhanced boot fit, tailored snow protection, and a customisable look. Elastic Adjustable Waistband: Elasticated velcro tabs for quick and secure adjustment. For the perfect fit! Belt Loops for Suspenders: Velcro belt loops are compatible with Dope suspenders. Reinforced Fly Closure: Dual snap button and velcro closure for secure and comfortable fit. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 40 gsm – Fellex®.

A defining pair of pants that rules the mountain with the kind of unattainable brilliance that all others aspire to. The Iconic are superbly waterproof, tailored to perfection with a relaxed and dropped-crotch fit, and so damn handsome that you can't quite look directly at them — kind of like the sun. And now, you too can share in their sheer, blinding magnificence, too, by owning your own pair. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Solution Dyed: Solution Dyed fabrics promote sustainability by conserving water and energy in their production. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Zipped and Meshed Vents: Meshed and zippered vents make cooling off super simple. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Zippered Gusseted Hems: Gusseted hems provide enhanced boot fit, tailored snow protection, and a customisable look. Elastic Adjustable Waistband: Elasticated velcro tabs for quick and secure adjustment. For the perfect fit! Belt Loops for Suspenders: Velcro belt loops are compatible with Dope suspenders. Reinforced Fly Closure: Dual snap button and velcro closure for secure and comfortable fit. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope JT Big Snowboard Pants Men Greenish/Olive Green
products.description: We’ve teamed up with ski legend Jesper Tjäder once again to create his signature line. Perfect for freestyle or freeride, this gear is Jesper’s first choice, and now, it can be yours, too! Allow us to introduce the Dope JT B.I.G. pants made in our 4-way stretch fabric to ensure absolute maximum mobility. The pants are designed with a clean, effortless style and the fewest seams possible for enhanced durability and weatherproofing. We also threw in a dropped crotch and a baggy, wide-leg fit for ultimate comfort and a laid-back look. And with two zipped side pockets, a built-in stretchy belt with an aluminium buckle, and a zipped fly, these pants are perfect for all-mountain adventures, offering park-rat fashion with big mountain capability. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. Adjustable Drawstring Hem: Customise your fit with an integrated drawstring and toggle adjuster. Fly Closure: Zipped fly opening for comfort and easy wardrobe changes. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. products.name: Dope JT Spartan Snowboard Jacket Men Olive Green/Whitish/Greenish
products.description: We’ve teamed up with ski legend Jesper Tjäder once again to create his signature line. Perfect for freestyle or freeride, this gear is Jesper’s first choice, and now, it can be yours, too! Dope JT Spartan Jacket reps a super minimalist and lightweight design, featuring a contrast waterproof front zipper and two zipped side pockets for all your essentials. With its all-in retro "box" shape and adjustable bottom drawstring, the Spartan is all about combining throwback style with modern performance. Designed with 4-way stretch, this jacket ensures maximum mobility, letting you move freely whether you're carving through powder or laying it down off the biggest kickers in the park. The Spartan is perfect for those who appreciate a minimalist aesthetic but still demand high performance. Tried and tested by JT himself, you know this jacket can handle anything you throw at it. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 4-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. products.name: Dope JT Zenith Ski Jacket Men Old White
products.description: We’ve teamed up with ski legend Jesper Tjäder once again to bring you a signature variant of the Zenith jacket. Perfect for freestyle or freeride, this gear is Jesper’s first choice, and now, it can be yours, too! The Zenith is a laid-back jacket with baggy utility style thanks to its four oversized cargo pockets, a bombproof 4-way stretch outer shell, and boxy cut to give retro vibes to your next mountain adventure. Inspired by our Legacy jacket, the Zenith embodies a less-is-more ethos, delivering all the essential features you need for a long day on the mountain, without unnecessary bulk. Built to tear up the hill all season long thanks to its supreme versatility, but carefully crafted with a lightweight design that puts riding freedom at the forefront, the Zenith is sure to be the jacket you reach for again and again this winter. On the JT Zenith, we removed the chest pockets and added magnetic closure on all pockets and the front placket. On top of that, we switched out all the lining to an ultra-light, super-stretchy fabric for added lightness and movability. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 4-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. products.name: Dope Legacy Snowboard Jacket Men Black
products.description: Throwback looks combined with modern tech, the Legacy is a 90s-inspired boxy-cut anorak with lots of style, and tech specs to match fully-featured ski jackets. Made with relaxed sessions in mind, the Legacy is a pull-on-and-go style jacket that'll keep the snow off your back, and the other riders on their toes. When you don't need fancy zips or any of that other bulky snow-jacket stuff, the Legacy is perfect. And equipped with our bombproof 2-way stretch shell, the Legacy is sure to leave an impression wherever you go. products.name: Dope Lofty Leggings Women Black
products.description: The Lofty leggings from Dope are an essential piece of active wear that no wardrobe should be without. We gave them a few cool upgrades this year, making them from the same awesome polyester and spandex mix you’ve come to know and love. Up top they’ve got that stylish high-waisted cut with a laser-cut phone pocket for complete pressure reduction and versatility, while lower down we gave them flatlock seams to eliminate chafing. Then we finished them off with an above-the-ankle cut for total compatibility with all socks and trainers. Are these the perfect gym leggings? You decide.

products.name: Dope Lofty Tech Leggings Women Black
products.description: The Lofty Tech tights are as technical as gym leggings come and have plenty of awesome features to set them apart from the crowd. We started with the same amazing high-waisted design as our classic Lofty leggings, and made them from the same super stretchy and comfy polyester and spandex blend. Then we gave them a little something extra with a laser-cut pocket for your phone at the back of the waistband, and a unique off-set seam and panel construction with two extra mesh pockets. This allows them to flex more naturally without pulling, giving an even greater range of motion, as well as making them super handy for carrying your cards, a key, or anything else! All this makes the Lofty leggings ideal for extreme sports or for those situations where you really need to push just a little harder, and the most versatile and useful leggings around.

products.name: Dope Razor Leggings Women Black
products.description:
The Razor leggings from Dope are a super comfortable pair of stretchy gym pants perfect for pushing yourself a little harder. With a mid-rise cut complete with a comfy elasticated waistband, these leggings are designed to reduce pressure on the waist, and offer maximum mobility. We gave them flatlock seams then, to eliminate chafing, and an above-the-ankle cut for total compatibility with socks and trainers. Simple and effective, the Razor leggings are everything you could need, and a whole lot more. Plus, fun fact, they also double as excellent base layer pants for skiing, too!

Material: 85% Polyester, 15% Spandex

products.name: Dope Macon 2.0 MIPS Ski Helmet X-Up Matte White w/ Black
products.description: The Macon 2.0 is a skate-styled ski and snowboard helmet packed with tech to keep your head safe this winter. With a hard-shell construction, the Macon 2.0 is 20% lighter than the original Macon, and has a low-profile, bombshell look ensuring optimum fit with goggles as well as hoods. Now featuring Bern’s Compass Fit system, you can dial in the snugness to your exact size for superior safety and comfort all day long. With a removable liner and included summer line option, the Macon is ideal for use all year round, both on and off the mountain, and with a host of safety standards, you can trust that you’ll be well looked after in the event of a crash. This version of the helmet also features MIPS technology. Standing for Multi-Directional Impact Protection System, MIPS is an extra layer of protection while riding that disperses energy during glancing or off-angle impacts with the helmet. Designed to specifically reduce rotational force on the brain, MIPS is the best choice for protection while on the mountain, and is trusted by millions of riders every time they head onto the mountain. Safety Standards: CPSC, EN1077B, EN1078 MIPS: YES All of our Dope x Bern collaboration helmets include both a winter and a summer liner for all season use. MIPS: MIPS enhances the protection against concussion and trauma. Clip-on strap: Quick clip-on and easy release. products.name: Dope Notorious B.I.B Ski Pants Men Black
products.description: Add a little notoriety to your riding with the Notorious bib. It's a head turner and a piste burner, equipped with the latest tech to keep you warm and comfortable all day long. With super slick slouchy style that oozes steeze, and waterproofing that'd put a walrus to shame, the Notorious bib is a ride-everything, all-mountain slayer. And with an insanely comfortable relaxed fit and dropped crotch, unbeatable durability, and lots of storage, we wouldn't blame you if you never took it off. We know we haven't!. Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Zipped and Meshed Vents: Meshed and zippered vents make cooling off super simple. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Customise the fit to your liking. Built-In Adjustable Suspenders: Built-in elasticated suspenders are adjustable for the perfect fit. Side Zip Access: Getting in and out is super simple with our upgraded side-zip opening, complete with inner placket for enhanced waterproofing. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. products.name: Dope Blizzard Light W Full Zip Outdoor Jacket Women Olive Green
products.description: The Blizzard FZ LIGHT is a super comfortable and lightweight hiking jacket with the technical capabilities to weather any storm. Building on our winter-focused Blizzard FZ platform, this jacket offers great mobility thanks to our new 2-layer ultralight shell fabric. Simple and elegant, the Blizzard FZ LIGHT is the natural choice for your next outdoor adventure. Whether it's deep forests, high peaks, or urban streets, you need a jacket you can rely on ... and this is it. Purpose-built for adventure, these jackets and pants are perfect for exploring the city, or setting your sights on distant mountain peaks. Storm Guard Hood: Shaped hood with front and rear adjustment options for ultimate weather protection. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Front Zipper with Double Plackets: Double placket system ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Velcro Adjustable Cuffs: Tighten or loosen your cuffs with secure velcro straps. Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style. Dope DRYTECH Membrane: Dope DRYTECH membrane offers superior waterproofing and breathability through the use of hydrophilic membrane technology. Actively drawing moisture from the skin, the membrane keeps you dry even during intense sessions. 15.000 mm / 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Durable Water Repellent (DWR): All of our fabrics are treated using a PFAS-free, eco friendly DWR treatment from HeiQ EcoDry. Water beads off instead of soaking in, improving waterproofing, and keep the fabric working at maximum breathability.. Fully Taped Seams: We fully tape our seams to make sure water can't get in. The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by using a special tape that makes them totally waterproof, you can ride in the deepest powder or the gnarliest storms with confidence.. Shell Fabric LIGHT: Our ultra light 2-layer laminated shell is equipped with a super tough woven outer, and a unique Dope DRYTECH waterproof membrane. Enhanced with an eco-friendly high-performance DWR treatment, this shell fabric is adventure ready, with amazing waterproofing and breathability, and unbeatable durability. bluesign® approved materials..

products.name: Dope Pile Fleece Sweater Men Blue Steel
products.description: When it comes to chunky, cosy fleeces, the Pile is the only choice. Made using a super soft 285gsm 100% polyester Hi-loft fleece, it’s the ideal companion for your mountain adventures. And with its ultra-warm design, and stellar breathability, it’s great for winter use around the resort, but also as the perfect mid-layer for those colder days on the hill. With a chimney-style collar and quarter-zip design, you can warm up or cool off when you need to. With its elasticated cuffs, the sleeves won’t ride up under your ski jacket, and thanks to its oversized, double-zipped handwarmer pocket, your valuables are kept safe and secure all day. We finished it off with a drawstring hem, and a healthy dose of our unique Dope styling to make it your new favourite fleece for this winter season. Half-Zip Collar: A chimney collar with half-zip construction to keep warm or cool off. Zipped Hand Warmer Pocket: Oversized hand warmer pocket with dual-zip opening for spacious secure storage. Elasticated Cuffs: Elasticated cuffs lock warmth in and stop your sleeves from riding up. Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style.

products.name: Dope Pile 22 Fleece Sweater Men Light Grey
products.description:
When it comes to big, thick, plushy, pile fleeces, they don’t get better than this. We thought to ourselves, how do bears feel? And this is probably pretty close. Designed to be the cosiest, chunkiest fleece midlayer in the world, we went all out and made this with an insane 380gsm 100% polyester pile.

This fleece is the ultimate warm midlayer that will have no problem standing up to even the coldest conditions. And with a chimney style collar and quarter zip, heat regulation is no trouble. And just as an added bonus, we gave it elasticated cuffs, a large zippered hand warmer pocket in front, and a drawstring hem to keep the wind out.

When getting chilly isn’t up for debate, reach for your Pile fleece. Whether it’s kicking around a snowy resort, a long plane ride, or even just stretching out at home, the Pile is the ultimate cosy companion, and once you slip it on, you’ll wonder how you ever got by without it. bluesign®: bluesign® unites the entire textile value chain to reduce the impact on people and the planet, with a focus on sustainable chemistry. bluesign® approved materials on this product are: All fabric Read more at bluesign.com Recycled: This product is made from recycled polyester to

products.name: Dope Downpour Rain Jacket Men Black
products.description: The Downpour jacket is a new addition to the Dope range, and makes use of our amazing featherlight 3-layer fabric. Built using an innovative 4-way stretch design, this jacket is the most packable, dependable, and mobility-focused jacket in the line-up. When you need a jacket you can rely on in all weather, and one that doesn't take up any room in your pack, the Downpour is ready to deliver. Purpose-built for adventure, these jackets and pants are perfect for exploring the city, or setting your sights on distant mountain peaks. Brimmed Storm Hood: A shaped hood with front and rear adjusters helps keep the rain off your face and the brim reduces dripping. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Velcro Adjustable Cuffs: Tighten or loosen your cuffs with secure velcro straps. Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style. Dope DRYTECH Membrane: Dope DRYTECH membrane offers superior waterproofing and breathability through the use of hydrophilic membrane technology. Actively drawing moisture from the skin, the membrane keeps you dry even during intense sessions. 15.000 mm / 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Durable Water Repellent (DWR): All of our fabrics are treated using a PFAS-free, eco friendly DWR treatment from HeiQ EcoDry. Water beads off instead of soaking in, improving waterproofing, and keep the fabric working at maximum breathability.. Fully Taped Seams: We fully tape our seams to make sure water can't get in. products.name: Dope Razor Leggings Women Blot Peach
products.description: The Razor leggings from Dope are a super comfortable pair of stretchy gym pants perfect for pushing yourself a little harder. With a mid-rise cut complete with a comfy elasticated waistband, these leggings are designed to reduce pressure on the waist, and offer maximum mobility. We gave them flatlock seams then, to eliminate chafing, and an above-the-ankle cut for total compatibility with socks and trainers. Simple and effective, the Razor leggings are everything you could need, and a whole lot more. Plus, fun fact, they also double as excellent base layer pants for skiing, too!

products.name: Dope Sight Ski Goggles Black/Blue Mirror
products.description: The Sight is a super slick cylindrical goggle with lots of great tech to make your life on the mountain easier. Ride in comfort and style this season by fully customising your look. The Sight is here, and it’s ready for adventure. Dual-Layer Interchangeable Lens: The Sight features a dual-layer lens for better clarity and contrast, as well as an easy to use lens-lock system for quick swaps on the mountain. You’ll also get 100% UVA and UVB protection, and a tough anti-scratch coating to keep your goggles in top condition for longer. Hyper-flexible TPU frame: Injection molded TPU frame provides superior comfort and fit, as well as better energy dispersal on impact. Which means our goggles don’t snap! Helmet compatible: Designed to work seamlessly with all major helmet brands. Improved fit means better comfort and powder protection. Fully Vented: Equipped with our advanced venting system, air circulates freely, keeping you fog and sweat free! Triple-Layer Triple-Density Foam: Triple layer foam is soft and breathable for the ultimate all-day wearing experience. Hardcase included: All goggles come with a complimentary zipped hard case to keep your goggles safe and protected during transit or storage.

products.name: Dope Sight Ski Goggles White/Green Mirror

Ride in comfort and style this season by fully customising your look. The Sight is here, and it’s ready for adventure. products.name: Dope Power Ski Gloves Black/White
products.description: Designed to be the perfect park and liner glove, the Power is a lightweight and super stretchy glove with touch-screen capabilities, a silicone-printed non-slip palm, and our most breathable construction yet. Constructed from a 95% polyester and 5% spandex blend, they perfectly form to your hands, making them the ideal choice for keeping off the windchill during those spring park laps, or for wearing under your ski gloves for extra warmth in cold weather. Made with a super stretchy and highly breathable recycled polyester-spandex blend with Anti-Odour HeiQ tech and our quickest drying and most moisture-wicking construction yet, the Snuggle is ready for even the most active days on the mountain. products.name: Dope Snuggle 22 Base Layer Top Men 2X-Up Black
products.description:
The Snuggle is just about as snuggly as base layers come. It’s got a super stretchy and cosy poly-spandex construction with a smooth outer that actively wicks moisture away from the skin, and a soft and plush brushed inner that’s comfy on the skin all day long. We also added some special Dope touches to put it right over the top, too.

The fit is perfect — not too tight, not too baggy. Just right for all day riding. And with the spandex content, it’ll fit all body types and shapes without pulling or adding unnecessary pressure, meaning you can ride in complete comfort. On top of that, we added in a rolled turtleneck for ultimate temperature regulation, which completes the Snuggle as the best dang base layer in the whole wide, snow-covered world. Or at least we think so.

products.name: Dope Snuggle W 22 Base Layer Pant Women 2X-Up Black
products.description: Snuggle up this winter with the Snuggle base layer bottoms. They fit like leggings, perform like baselayers, and feel amazing. We gave them a super technical polyester-spandex mix construction, which is ultra stretchy, highly breathable, and moisture-wicking so you stay cool and comfortable. And speaking of comfort…We gave them a smooth outer so that they feel great under your outer layers, and a brushed inner so they’re all fleecy and cosy! Up top there’s also a wide elasticated waistband to relieve pressure and keep them in place, meaning you can focus on your riding, instead of yanking your pants up every ten seconds.Add in flatlock seams to prevent chafing, and a tight-but-not-too-tight figure-hugging fit, and these are without doubt the best base layers in the universe (unless some advanced alien race have developed some better ones — but that can’t be helped, I guess).

products.name: Dope Snuggle W 22 Base Layer Top Women 2X-Up Black
products.description:
The Snuggle is just about as snuggly as base layers come. It’s got a super stretchy and cosy poly-spandex construction with a smooth outer that actively wicks moisture away from the skin, and a soft and plush brushed inner that’s comfy on the skin all day long. We also added some special Dope touches to put it right over the top, too.

The fit is perfect — not too tight, not too baggy. Just right for all day riding. And with the spandex content, it’ll fit all body types and shapes without pulling or adding unnecessary pressure, meaning you can ride in complete comfort. On top of that, we added in a rolled turtleneck for ultimate temperature regulation, which completes the Snuggle as the best dang base layer in the whole wide, snow-covered world. Or at least we think so.

products.name: Dope Snuggle W 22 Base Layer Top Women 2X-Up Washed Ink
products.description:
The Snuggle is just about as snuggly as base layers come. It’s got a super stretchy and cosy poly-spandex construction with a smooth outer that actively wicks moisture away from the skin, and a soft and plush brushed inner that’s comfy on the skin all day long. We also added some special Dope touches to put it right over the top, too.

The fit is perfect — not too tight, not too baggy. Just right for all day riding. And with the spandex content, it’ll fit all body types and shapes without pulling or adding unnecessary pressure, meaning you can ride in complete comfort. On top of that, we added in a rolled turtleneck for ultimate temperature regulation, which completes the Snuggle as the best dang base layer in the whole wide, snow-covered world. Or at least we think so.

products.name: Dope Spartan Ski Jacket Men Black
products.description: Dope Spartan Jacket sports a super clean and straightforward design, featuring a contrast waterproof front zipper and two zipped side pockets for all your essentials. With its all-in retro "box" shape and adjustable bottom drawstring, the Spartan is all about combining throwback style with modern performance. Designed with 2-way stretch, this jacket ensures maximum mobility, letting you move freely whether you're carving through powder or throwing down in the park. The Spartan is perfect for those who appreciate a minimalist aesthetic but still demand a jacket that can do it all. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 2-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. A minimalist approach keeps you light on your feet so you can truly push your riding. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric, All Insulation and All Lining Storm Guard Hood: Helmet-compatible storm guard hood with front and rear drawstring adjustment for the perfect fit. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Secure internal pocket designed for your phone and other valuables. Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Wrist Gaiters: Stretchy and comfortable, perfect for keeping the snow out. Front Zipper with Inner Placket: Waterproof front zipper and wide inner placket ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Microfleece Chinguard: Super soft microfleece lined chinguard Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – TSGS. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 60/40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope Standard W T-shirt Women 2X-Up Black
products.description: The Standard T-Shirt is the perfect companion for every adventure. Made from a super soft Oekotext 100 certified 260gsm single jersey fabric with a 63% organic cotton, 37% Tencel blend construction, it's ultra durable and high performance, too. We gave it our own signature Dope fit, and threw on our favourite designs to give it that little something extra. Whether it's a first layer for a day of lapping the resort, or you're hitting the beach at the height of summer, the Standard is the perfect choice for every season. Made in Portugal.

products.name: Dope Stanton II Facemask Black
products.description: We’re not saying that the Stanton neckwarmers are the best neckwarmers you can buy ... But if you wanted to say that, then we wouldn’t argue! Made from sturdy 100% recycled polyester softshell fabric, this neckwarmer boasts a 15k waterproof rating, as well as 15k in breathability. And on top of that, we added our eco-friendly PFAS-free DWR coating to help you shrug off powder shots to the face. We then made it totally ergonomic and shaped to the face so that it reduces pressure on the bridge of the nose, making breathing easier. And with air-holes perfectly positioned, you can breathe as hard as you want and never feel constricted. All this is finished off with a super cosy terry-loop inner, so you can ride all day in total comfort. If you’re looking for a facemask you can put on in the morning and not take off until the last lift, you just found it. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. products.name: Dope Sublime Fleece Hoodie Men Black
products.description: Sublime fleece hoodie from Dope blends slick streetwear style with full-on, mountain-ready performance. Designed with a boxy, street-inspired silhouette and crafted from a single, high-performance fleece fabric that’s super stretchy, soft, and wind-resistant. This hoodie delivers serious comfort and protection in all conditions. An adjustable bottom hem and a unique dual-button hood and collar system offer a customizable fit with a clean, street-ready look. Finished with premium embroidered logos and a minimalist design, it’s the perfect blend of function and style, ready to pair with anything in your kit. The best of both worlds, all in one layer. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. products.name: Dope Tigress W Snowboard Pants Women Walnut
products.description: Skinny, stretchy snow pants. You might be sold already, just from those four words. But if not, allow us to sweeten the deal. We threw in a little spandex to give these pants some elasticity, and then cranked things up with some awesome design touches. They’ve got waterproofing for days, a 2-way stretch, as well as a snug fit with a bootcut hem, you know, just for a splash of retro flair. There are few pairs of pants out there that look like this, and even fewer that can handle everything mother earth serves up. From the jungle to the slopes, the tiger is on the hunt! Utilising our highest performance materials and design, this collection provides maximum environmental protection, and features designed to ride the biggest lines and the deepest powder. This collection can do it all, no matter the conditions. Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Zippered Gusseted Hems: Gusseted hems provide enhanced boot fit, tailored snow protection, and a customisable look. Elastic Adjustable Waistband: Elasticated velcro tabs for quick and secure adjustment. For the perfect fit! Reinforced Fly Closure: Dual snap button and velcro closure for secure and comfortable fit. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon.

products.name: Dope Vertex Ski Pants Men Black
products.description: The Vertex Bib is a modern classic, reimagined with Dope’s signature streetwear-meets-tech DNA. This bib blends rugged functionality with a sleek, ride-everything silhouette—engineered for comfort, performance, and all-day wear. Made from our advanced lightweight 2-way stretch waterproof shell and outfitted with exposed waterproof zips for that crisp, technical vibe, this bib is built to take on the harshest mountain days while keeping your style on lock. Topped off with an adjustable suspenders system, smart storage options, and a dialed-in fit, the Vertex is your go-to for exploring side hits, sidecountry, and everything in between. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 2-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. A minimalist approach keeps you light on your feet so you can truly push your riding. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric, All Insulation and All Lining Elasticated Snow Gaiters: Non-slip cuff with lace hook for secure snow protection. Adjustable Drawstring Hem: Customise your fit with an integrated drawstring and toggle adjuster. Built-In Adjustable Suspenders: Built-in elasticated suspenders are adjustable for the perfect fit. Side Button Access: Getting in and out is super simple with our upgraded side-button opening, complete with inner gusset for enhanced waterproofing. Fly Closure: Zipped fly opening for comfort and easy wardrobe changes. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – TSGS. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope Vertex W Ski Jacket Women Black
products.description: Introducing the Vertex, the latest evolution in Dope’s jacket game. A sleek collision of our iconic streetwear-inspired design and high-performance tech, this jacket is purpose-built for the mountains, with no compromises in style or function. Constructed with our advanced waterproof and breathable 2-way lightweight stretch shell, and finished with rugged, exposed waterproof zips for that clean, tech-forward edge, this jacket is made to ride hard and look good doing it. The minimalist design strips away excess bulk while keeping the essentials: comfort, mobility, and serious protection from the elements. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 2-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. A minimalist approach keeps you light on your feet so you can truly push your riding. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Secure internal pocket designed for your phone and other valuables. Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Wrist Gaiters: Stretchy and comfortable, perfect for keeping the snow out. Front Zipper with Inner Placket: Waterproof front zipper and wide inner placket ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – TSGS. Climate Control: Thermal Insulation with state-of-the-art materials, combining perfect comfort with high thermal insulation properties, for true all-day comfort. 60/40 gsm – Fellex®.

products.name: Dope Zenith Snowboard Jacket Men Bottle Green
products.description: The Zenith is a laid-back jacket with baggy utility style thanks to its four oversized cargo pockets, a bombproof 4-way stretch outer shell, and boxy cut to give retro vibes to your next mountain adventure. Inspired by our Legacy jacket, the Zenith embodies a less-is-more ethos, delivering all the essential features you need for a long day on the mountain, without unnecessary bulk. Built to tear up the hill all season long thanks to its supreme versatility, but carefully crafted with a lightweight design that puts riding freedom at the forefront, the Zenith is sure to be the jacket you reach for again and again this winter. Built around a lightweight and bombproof shell fabric platform with built in 4-way stretch, the Freedom collection is designed for maximum mobility. A minimalist approach keeps you light on your feet so you can truly push your riding. bluesign®: bluesign® is a rigorous certification that ensures our clothing is sustainably produced, reducing water waste and harmful chemicals. This means safer working conditions for workers and a cleaner environment for all. This is a bluesign® approved product, adhering to the highest standard in the bluesign® certification. Recycled: Our Recycled Polyester PET is sourced from repurposed plastic bottles. It significantly reduces pollution, lowers greenhouse gas emissions, and conserves energy and water compared to virgin polyester. Recycled materials on this product: All Shell Fabric and All Insulation. Solution Dyed: Solution Dyed fabrics promote sustainability by conserving water and energy in their production. This durable and colorfast textile marks a significant shift towards environmentally responsible practices. Solution Dyed materials on this product: All Lining Fabric. Storm Guard Hood: Helmet-compatible storm guard hood with front and rear drawstring adjustment for the perfect fit. Underarm Vents: Large zipped vents are perfect for quick cooling. Media Pocket: Easy-access pocket made specifically for phones with internal headphone cord outlet Lift Pass Pocket: A velcro pocket for your ski pass perfectly located on the left sleeve for easy access. Wrist Gaiters: Stretchy and comfortable, perfect for keeping the snow out. Front Zipper with Double Plackets: Double placket system ensures waterproofing in tough conditions. Microfleece Chinguard: Super soft microfleece lined chinguard Drawstring Hem: Adjustable drawstring hem lets you customise your fit and style. Waterproofing: Snow and rain are part of a rider's reality. That's why we use a bonded waterproof membrane that provides a solid barrier against moisture, together with a PFAS-free DWR treatment for rapid water beading and runoff. 15.000 mm – DRY Tech. Breathability: Managing the humidity that builds up inside from body heat is crucial. Our bonded membrane system offers top-notch breathability, effectively managing moisture. 15.000 g – DRY Tech. Taped Seams: The seams are the weakest point of any garment, so by applying a special adhesive tape that makes sure water can't get in, you can ride in the worst conditions with confidence. Fully taped – Sealon.
